post.body: My favorite traffic maneuver in China: if your direction is jammed, Just slide left and drive on the wrong side of the road. WK? It's open!
More on Mongolian dinner: Staff Mongolian, Restaurant is outdoors: 20 circular tents, enveloped in darkness. BTW, I sat in the king's chair
Chinese puzzle: Master degrees from best schools in world, $200/mo for golf lessons, new $25K cars, salary range? $250 to $350/mo in China.
Mongolian dinner, authentic, lamb seasoned with cumin, from nose to tail, then KTV, (Karaoke), wow! WoW! everyone was a star singer.
A little groggy now, breakfast is served, didn't I just eat? Emails are rolling in...
Wonderful xmas show in Xi'an, VIP box, top Asian talent (except magician), too much wine for wife, top chefs dinner special for exec staff
Taught nonverbal comm. to hotel sale force of Sofitel, always a challenge when engish is the 2nd language, but it is nonverbal class, right?
Driving in China: lines are guidelines, stop signs are yield signs, whoever has more mass has the right of way, flow like fish in current
Canceled weekend in Beijing, temperatures at 100 year low. Too cold for outdoor sightseeing. Below freezing here in Xi'an as well.
Oddest food this trip? Duck tongue, turtle shell (cooked at high temperature until it softens), and lamb backbone. Lamb was the best.
BTW, I can't blog on my site from China, why? Blocked by the Chinese government. Most blog-hosting sites blocked here. BS
What else is diff in China? Rise of individuality. Hair style, hair color, love of fashion to tasteless dress to bland and pedestrian.
What else is diff in China? Much bigger middle and upper middle class and they are buying and driving well made cars
What's diff in China? SUVs. Didn't see a single SUV 7 years ago. Now in the mix of typical choices.
What is different in China? Rise of the chain restaurant. Not talking about KFC, which is the biggest, but Chinese cuisines.
What's different in China from 7 years ago? Quieter. Most of the motorcycles are gone, replaced by battery-powered bicycles & scooters
Dealing with a water pipe brake at home, while I'm in China. Ugh!
Waking up in Xian, CN, plowing through emails, ready to order room service (or go back to sleep)...humm
Just returned from shopping in Hangzhou. Best market I've been to in China, lots of quality, hand crafted, and beautiful pieces.
packing for China, still have work to do, yet up at 4:00 AM, oh well, will sleep on the planes.
